name: Jack and Jill: A Twisted Tale
name_original: Jack and Jill: A Twisted Tale
description: Jack and Jill went up a hill...and fell down, down, down into a forest of nightmares. After a horrible accident, two siblings are left desolate at the heart of a dark forest with no hope of escape. Jack is unresponsive, and it is up to his older sister Jill to find a way through the woods to save her brother's life and return home. What begins as a rescue mission turns into something more eerie, as confronts strange animals, mazes, and ominous creatures... She has always been the practical one in her family -- will this sinister forest draw out her insanity? This is a short character-driven Bitsy game that puts a psychological thriller twist to the classic nursery rhyme "Jack and Jill", using horror elements to help push the core of the story forward.
